page.title: 02SCHOOL-LIFE IN CROY
page.content: During the week I come to Croy School. This may be a typical day for me. {8:00.}I emerge sleepily from my bed and get dressed.I rush downstairs for my breakfast. {9:00}.Climb into car and head for school.{9:20}.Bell rings and we head for the classroom.{9:20 to 10:45}. Usually maths.If it is Tuesday it will be swimming or Art;on Thursday it is Gym.{10:45 to 11:05}.Playtime,we usually play football(two teams try to kick a leather ball between two posts). {11:05}.Bell,back to class. {11:05 to 12:40}.Environmental Studies. {12:40 to 13:30}.Lunch Time.{13:30 to} {15:20}.Project work{15:20 to} {17:45}.Watch T.V.{17:45}.Tea {18:00 to 21:00}.Watch T.V. or play computer.{21:00}.Bed
